description:
You are in the dashboard.
Login via [bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html](https://bookingflix.com/net/sign-in.html)

You can delete your account at Bookingflix at any time. Your data and the appointment data will be deleted completely. If you still need the appointment data, we recommend a previous download of the data.

1. Click on ***profile***.
2. Click on ***membership***.
3. Click on ***delete membership***. Confirm the final deletion with your account password.

If you have a premium membership and a direct debit, cancel it separately. Or send an email with the subject: Cancellation direct debit and your customer number to support@bookingflix.com.
title: Delete account
